global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

queries.description: queries to retrieve cpu/memory metrics for cluster/node/pod

namespace_memory.default: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="",pod!=""{{.Values.prometheus.labels | default .Values.prometheusLabels}}} * on(pod, namespace) group_left kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"{{.Values.prometheus.labels | default .Values.prometheusLabels}}} > 0) by (namespace)
namespace_memory.title: namespace_memory

node_memory.default: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="",pod!=""{{.Values.prometheus.labels | default .Values.prometheusLabels}}} * on(pod, namespace) group_left kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"{{.Values.prometheus.labels | default .Values.prometheusLabels}}} > 0) by (node)
node_memory.title: node_memory

queries.title: queries

enabled.description:
If this is set to false, no playbooks will be created
If true, all individual playbook values will be honored
enabled.title: enabled

labels.description:
prometheus labels to inject: "\,label1=key1\,label2=key2\,label3=~key3"
Note: comma(,) needs to be escaped as /, and prometheus.labels should always start with '/,' to work with existing labels
labels.title: labels
